name: TooLoo.ai Skills OS
changelog: V1.2.2 - Phase 1 VERIFIED: All 4 Native Engines Boot Successfully
V1.2.2 - TypeScript strict mode compliance (fixed 'possibly undefined' errors)
V1.2.2 - Internal config types ensure required properties at runtime
V1.2.1 build 2 - Phase 1 COMPLETE: Native Engines (NO LEGACY DEPENDENCIES)
V1.2.1 - LearningEngine: Q-learning, epsilon-greedy exploration, rewards
V1.2.1 - EvolutionEngine: A/B testing, prompt strategies, improvement goals
V1.2.1 - EmergenceEngine: Pattern detection, skill synergies, emergent goals
V1.2.1 - RoutingEngine: Provider routing, waterfall fallback, health monitoring
V1.2.1 - Kernel integration: context.services.engines available to all skills
V1.2.0 build 1 - Phase 0 COMPLETE: ToolExecutor + 8 tools implemented
V1.2.0 - All 20 skill YAMLs now have full schema compliance
V1.2.0 - Safety checks: path validation, rate limiting, audit logging
V1.2.0 - Approval workflow for file writes and terminal commands
V1.2.0 - 13 tool execution tests, all passing
V1.1.0 build 1 - Fixed skill version format for YAML validator
V1.1.0 - Skills OS routing fix complete
V1.1.0 - Added Gemini provider support (4 LLM providers total)
